original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields open steady, rupee at 319.75/320 against the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT –  Sri Lanka’s bond yields were steady at open on Tuesday while the rupee opened at 320/320.50 against the US dollar, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted unchanged at 27.30/28.00 percent steady from 27.60/28.00 percent a day earlier.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted unchanged at 26.75/27.00 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted unchanged at 25.60/80 percent.
The rupee closed at 320/320.50 to the US dollar in the spot market depreciated from Monday’s close at 319.75/320 rupees. (Colombo/ April18/2023)
